name: Slimeys' Adventures
description:
This is a small prototype I've made during my 3rd Trimester @SAE in Melbourne as a Games Programmer. You control a slime with which you can jump around, split and merge again.

The only demo scene that exists so far contains some simple puzzles for your to solve.

My main focus in this project was to mess around with state machines and learn some other interesting stuff in Unity.
